thread.title: BRIEF-Alliance Resource Partners Reports Quarterly Revenue $457.1 Mln

title: BRIEF-Alliance Resource Partners Reports Quarterly Revenue $457.1 Mln
text:
April 30, 2018 / 11:30 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Alliance Resource Partners Reports Quarterly Revenue $457.1 Mln Reuters Staff 2 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - Alliance Resource Partners LP:
* ALLIANCE RESOURCE PARTNERS, L.P. REPORTS INCREASES TO NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO ARLP AND EBITDA OF 48.6% AND 28.7%, RESPECTIVELY; RAISES QUARTERLY CASH DISTRIBUTION 1.0% TO $0.515 PER UNIT; AND INCREASES GUIDANCE
* ALLIANCE RESOURCE PARTNERS LP QUARTERLY REVENUE $457.1 MLN
* ALLIANCE RESOURCE PARTNERS LP QTRLY BASIC AND DILUTED NET INCOME OF ARLP PER LIMITED PARTNER UNIT $1.16
* ALLIANCE RESOURCE PARTNERS LP - SEES 2018 COAL PRODUCTION OF 40.0 MLN TO 41.0 MLN TONS
* ALLIANCE RESOURCE PARTNERS LP - SEES 2018 COAL SALES VOLUMES OF 40.3 MLN TO 41.3 MLN TONS
* ALLIANCE RESOURCE PARTNERS LP - SEES FY 2018 REVENUES (EXCLUDING TRANSPORTATION REVENUES) OF $1.87 BLN TO $1.91 BLN
* ALLIANCE RESOURCE PARTNERS LP QTRLY COAL TONS SOLD 9,398 TONS VS 9,610 TONS
* ALLIANCE RESOURCE PARTNERS LP - MAINTAINING PREVIOUS 2018 GUIDANCE FOR CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN A RANGE OF $220.0 MLN TO $240.0 MLN
* ALLIANCE RESOURCE PARTNERS LP QTRLY COAL TONS PRODUCED 10,482 TONS VS 10,218 TONS
* ALLIANCE RESOURCE PARTNERS LP Q1 REV VIEW $459.5 MLN — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ALLIANCE RESOURCE PARTNERS LP FY2018 REV VIEW $1.83 BLN — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
